changes.change: Remap "ВС" BK button to "Page Up" hardware key and "Ю @" BK button to "Page Down" hardware key.
Fix low register keycode for "0" BK button.
Moved settings-related and About menu items to the Settings dialog.
Added CPU speed configuration (Auto/3 MHz/4 MHz/6 MHz/Maximum).
Added on-screen keyboard display mode configuration (normal/overlay)
Emulator will not attempt to autostart screen BIN images on BK-0010.
Set EMT 36 / .BMB10 "STOP pressed" error code on BIN image loading error.
Fixed menu loaded BIN image starting by `S` directive for BK0010/KNGMD config.
Fixed on-screen joystick buttons stuck.
Fixed screenshot share preview.
Implemented SMK512 controller emulation (extended memory and IDE controller).
Added the ability to save and restore the emulator state.
Added support for hardware game controllers.
Disk and program image files now are saved and loaded using the system file manager.
Added support for Android TV.
Improved behaviour of the on-screen keyboard.
Added displaying of the selected configuration in the toolbar.
Fixed screen scrolling in the extended memory mode.
Improved emulation of the CRT raster effects.
Added low pass filters to Covox and speaker outputs.
Fixed on-screen keyboard displaying for some devices with the dark theme enabled.
Floppy disk image maximum number of tracks is increased to 82.
Improved handling of physical and on-screen keyboards.
Fixed on-screen joystick layout.
Implemented disk activity displaying in Disk Manager dialog.
Added take screenshot option.
Fixed application crash when screen is rotated in Audio Volume dialog.
Implemented read/write mode for floppy disk images.
Added full-screen mode.
Fixed 50 Hz timer interrupt timings.
Implemented AY-3-8910 programmable sound generator emulation.
Implemented 8-bit Covox emulation.
Added audio volume adjustment dialog.
Fixed loading of binary images containing spaces in the file name.
Added grayscale display mode.
Tape loader handler now automatically adds .BIN extension to the file name if needed.
Fixed an emulator lockup on some phones.
Improved compatibility with games that using downloadable overlays.
Improved handling of program and disk images from the external file managers.
User interface improvements.
Implemented base CRT raster effects emulation functionality.
Timer 50 Hz now is clocked by the vertical sync.
Fixed SHIFT+CAPS+RUS/LAT keyboard combinations handling.
Implemented BK0011 RAM pages mapping when BIN image is loaded.
Added recently used floppy disk images automounting on the emulator start.
Fixed RESET opcode handling.
Corrected colors for some BK0011 palettes.
Fixed open BIN file dialog error on Android 10.
Fixed WAIT opcode handling.
Fixed loading of disk images with file name containing spaces.
Fixed EMT36 syscall handling with non-zero file loading address.
Added support for 81-track floppy disk images.
Fixes and improvements in file chooser dialog.
Changed on-screen keyboard and joystick animation.
Fixed on-screen keyboard buttons handling.
Fixed configuration reset bug after app update.
Added six-button on-screen joystick.
Implemented file save using standard BK0010/11 system calls.
Fixed double quotes input on some hardware keyboards.
On-screen keyboard now is not hiding after screen rotation.
Added "Cancel" button to image file open dialog.
New Material Design icons.
Implemented emulation of BK-0011M with MSTD or floppy controller blocks attached.
Now .BIN images are loaded without emulation restart for BK-0011M and BK-0010 with floppy controller.
Fixed minor bugs in CPU emulation code.
Fixed loading of files with Cyrillic characters in name. Fixed Basic files loading with name shorter than 6 characters.
Fixed NPE while startup on Android < 2.3.
ROM write access now generates bus error.
Fixed refreshing of effective CPU frequency in About dialog.
Added BK-0010 configuration with floppy controller with 16 kB of SRAM and 4 floppy drives attached. Standard 800 kB disk images (.BKD, .IMG) mounting in write protected mode is supported.
Cancel of file image dialog doesn't break EMT interrupt now.
Fixed menu icon sizes.
Added standard two-button joystick emulation. Use single tap to press left joystick button, double tap to press right joystick button, scroll to move joystick handle in given direction.
Implemented change log displaying.
Added "Share" menu item.
First public release.
